author: .vbuterin
content: Update from ongoing usage; I definitely think <@!301186049323958275> had a good point that it is the maxfee and not the priority fee that generally causes txs to not get included quickly

author: .vbuterin
content: Ever since I started being more mindful about the maxfee the problems mostly went away (I've still still been bumping the prio to 2 gwei just in case, but even here, I'm getting much fewer issues with 2 gwei prio + high maxfee than I was with 3-5 gwei prio + default maxfee)

author: .vbuterin
content: Will try 1 gwei prio for a while too and keep reporting
